title: enran paDaginil Or
sahitya:
enran paDaginil Or mangai vandamarndanaL ennuLLam perum sukham sholat-taramO


anupallavi

  kunri vizhiyum veLLam kuriyilAdEghal pOl shenra puNaiyuminru shenneri mINDadu kAN


caraNam    nilavAnuDai kaNDEn neTri nayanam kaNDEn nINDa nidhiyum vaTri nirkkavum kaNDEnammA
kAlamarandavaLaik-kaNmun nirutti enrum kanavil midappadenak-kaLi kooNDu shelvEnE
